Articles.Content:
Hello!

Well that was a faff! Having played the demo on my Win10 VM on a macbook, I bought the full version from Squad. It insisted on two address lines, even though I only have one, but I got there in the end. But, ugh! The Win10 versions crashed my VM - even after I'd given the VM more memory and graphics memory. Didn't matter if it was 32 bit or 64 bit. Couldn't get the Mac version working at all ... until finally I realised that I only needed to move the KSP.APP out and back again. Then, hurrah!

So all Kerballed up, and my big achievement of the day, just as night was falling over the KSC, was to make it into space ... and back in one piece! I even got the hang of steering the rocket! Yay!

So hello from Essex, England. To the stars!

May your rocket design problems be easier than dealing with Windows 10. 

And welcome to the forum.
Welcome to the forums! Can't wait to see what you make!
